title: In Need Of 2 Players For OOL Team
body:
At the moment I have 5 people on the team they have their roles set as of this moment

Top: Julez (Gold 4)
Jungle: Formique (Gold 5)
Mid: Yaazzyy (Diamond 5)
ADC: OgggaWogga (Plat 3)
Support: MonstÃªr (Silver 1)

So I've found a full team surprisingly, and now I am just trying to see if anyone is interesting in subbing just in case someone needs to go for any reason, please feel free to contact me.

replies.body: Can i be a sub without ever having to sub : )
I have sent you a friend request on league. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
